description: From grave +‎ yard. Compare West Frisian begraafplak (“graveyard”), Dutch begraafplaats (“graveyard”), Norwegian gravplass (“graveyard”).

entries.meaning: A tract of land in which the dead are buried.

definitionGroups.group: (figuratively, by extension) A final storage place for collections of things that are no longer useful or useable.

entries.meaning: (collectible card games) The discard pile, in some trading card games.
(sports) A team where players are sent when they are not useful, or a team where players become useless if sent there.
(US, slang) Synonym of suicide (“beverage combining all available flavors at a soda fountain”)
